extendedInfo.description: Be proud that you are Muslim and show that to the world! Download FREE Best Islamic Wallpapers application and persoanlize your android phone in that way! This is the a beautiful collection of high quality islamic pictures. Find the background you like the most and set it on your home screen. You can see the beautiful islamic wallpaper from Muhammad ibn Abdullah feature a clean look and a strong expression: I am Proud to be Muslim!Check out a creative work  with calligraphic art using arabic letters to form a camel. The calligraphy is set in green wallpaper image with a tree and two of the animals. There is also a beautiful work that features the calligraphic style of the name of the Prophet of Islam: Muhammad. The arabic rendering is put in the middle of a spotlight. The arabic script itself also casts shadows to the surrounding.Then a modified wallpaper that features egyptian skylines with its famous pyramid and mosques. The desert takes the foreground. The clouds in the sky adds the dreamy mood of the scene.The Kaâbah is rendered beautifully in one of the hajj and eid ul adha wallpaper. A supplicating hand wishes for the islamic occasionsl. The dark blue sky in the background is adorned with crescent moon. One renders a beautiful horizon of kaâbah with buildings or skylines in the background. The golden yellow of the sky adds the beauty of this picture.You can congratulate your family or friends returning from Hajj with one beautiful Hajj Mabroor wallpaper.Salah ad-Din (Saladin) was the famous King that campaigned against the Crusaders and freed Jerusalem. He has built this great Citadel overlooking the city of Kairo, Egypt. This wallpaper is a beautiful photograph of this Citadel â which the inside looks like a mosqueOrange wallpaper featuring a calligraphic ornament of the arabic phrase: âAllahu Akbarâ (Allah is the Greatest). The picture also adorned with flower and swirl ornaments. Beautiful art for your android phone home screen.Green wallpaper to show that Islam is a way of life. It has a heart to show love to islam and arabic sentence showing the first tenet of islam: There is no god but Allah, Muhammad is the messenger of Allah.A beautiful expression of love to the Messenger of Allah, Muhammad, pbuh in the form of a colorful wallpaper. ÙØ¯Ø§Ù ÙÙØ¨Ù ÙØ§Ø±Ø³ÙÙ Ø§ÙÙÙ this arabic expression means ransom my heart or my heart is for you, o messenger of Allah.There is a calligraphic wallpaper that takes the call of prayer (athan) and transform it into a beautiful wallpaper with white and blue colors. The wallpaper has also a mosque in the background and a hadith: âthere is no Muslim that prostrates to God except that God raises him one degree in Paradise by it and forgives for him a sin.âThis red wallpaper by Muhammad is a typography of the 99 names of Allah or Asmaul Husna forming the word of Allah in arabic. A nice art work, simple and creative!Asmaul Husna or the Beautiful Names of Allah are 99 names or attributes of Allah that muslims encouraged to remember and supplicate with them. This wallpaper lists all those names in a beautiful arrangement with pastel colors.One image shows in golden arabic writing one verse from the Qurâan that praise the characters of our beloved Prophet Muhammad.Allah is The Light of the Heaven Wallpaper and many other beautiful Islamic images thet are a real work of art.Features of wallpapers app:- Works offline - no internet connection required after you download once.- App 2 SD card support.- Share app on Facebook, Twitter, send by bluetooth, send by gmail, save to Dropbox and more.- Free and always will beThis free app may contain ads in notification tray and may create internet shortcuts on your desktop. Shortcut icons can be deleted with no effect to this app. If you want to stop receiving notification(s), please go to http://www.unpush.me and http://opt.leadbolt.com/. Banner ads (if any), cannot be removed.
